name: Drone Attack - Space Shooter Game
description:
DEEZL - Drone Attack 

Fly your drone, avoid asteroids and shoot at enemies.

This first Drone Attack release is out for free hoping to receive your feedback.

Any kind offer is welcome to help the dev team.

Asset pack used for this game: 

Sci-Fi War Asset Pack All Formats:  https://deezl-studios.itch.io/sci-fi-war-asset-pack-all-formats

Sci-Fi War Asset Pack - Unity HDRP: https://deezl-studios.itch.io/sci-fi-war-asset-pack-unity-hdrp

Sci-Fi War Asset Pack - Unreal Engine: https://deezl-studios.itch.io/sci-fi-war-asset-pack-unreal-engine-ue4

Sci-Fi War Asset Pack - Blender and FBX: https://deezl-studios.itch.io/sci-fi-war-asset-pack-blender-and-fbx
